# [Interview #90: TPOD Signing Report - Rick Moen, Entry #4](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=90#4)

#### Question

Another reader asked how long he's been married to Harriet.

#### Robert Jordan

He said 18 yearsâ€”and that he has to have Harriet remind him, since it seems like last month.
